title: view area is not adjustable when focusing on connection windows
author: hungrysnake
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
the view area is not adjustable even the mouse pointer is showing adjustable.
it happens when the foucs is on the connection (eg. putty), when put the mouse hover the edge, the cursor changed to adjustable mode but it can't adjust (slide the edge). I have to click the connection windows (left side connection tree), then the adjustment works.
